title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: In the ImageAnalyzer example, the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved around, but they have no effect. Even when opening a small image, like an icon, the scrollbars are misleading because they do not perform any actions.
EB: Scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example should be disabled, indicating that they are not functional and do not have any effect on the displayed image.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2, GTK2, or KDE 2.2.10 (GTK2 only)
2. Open the ImageAnalyzer example
3. Notice that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved
4. Open a small image, such as an icon
5. Observe that the scrollbars do not have any effect on the displayed image
